ComicInfo.Summary: Get ready to check out all of your favorite Grimm Universe heroines and villainesses, soaking up the sun while wearing the season’s hottest swimsuit fashions! Many of the industry’s top artists contribute gorgeous pin-ups of the Grimm Universes’ most popular female characters in this stunning collection.
ComicInfo.Title: Swimsuit Special
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alfredo Reyes,Igor Vitorino,Ivan Nunes,J. Cardygrade,Josh Burns,Ylenia DiNapoli
